sys_script_include.description: Returns patterns found in evaluator errors, which should be ignored - as they are produced by OOTB components.
sys_script_include.name: GetEvaluatorErrorExceptionPatterns
sys_script_include.script:
function GetEvaluatorErrorExceptionPatterns() { var aPatterns = [ 'ShowRecentEvaluatorErrors', // this is to avoid the warning during DevTools installation ;) '"referrerpolicy" is not defined', 'browser.isMSIE11', 'devstudio_config.xml', '"RP" is not defined', '"xml_baseline_string" is not defined.', '"ChangeRequestDiscovery" is not defined.', 'GlideRecord.query() - invalid table name: itom_lu_discovery_sources', 'list2_header_search_cell.xml', 'com.glideapp.report', 'listV3RelatedList', '"__ref__" is not defined.', '60b1d53fef12110', // 60b1d53fef1211002841f7f775c0fb54 '293eb723d723210', // 293eb723d7232100b6bddb0c82520320 '708da435db83170', // 708da435db831700dd14596e5e96194e '4b28d4fcc785330', // 4b28d4fcc78533003725756d5ec2600c 'b9352546c742301', // b9352546c7423010099a308dc7c260d0 '3b16f51f5368111', // 3b16f51f536811101c1addeeff7b1209 'a37ebc6173c0011', // a37ebc6173c001104a905ee515f6a780
// Flow Designer '"actionOrder" is not defined.', '"modalTitle" is not defined.', '"subflowComponent" is not defined.', '"index" is not defined.', '"currentStep" is not defined.' ]; return aPatterns; }
